description: This is a React functional component called NoteModal, which provides a modal dialog interface for creating or editing notes. It manages local state for form fields, handles validation, and communicates with parent components via callbacks.

methods.name: NoteModal
methods.description: React component that renders a modal for creating or editing a note, handling focus, validation, and submission.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, performs validation, and calls onSubmit with note data if valid.
